zone.line: the curse which binds us to be subjected
to the accident of surrounding impressions
and whether its spreads its own
figured curtain or withdraws life's
dark veil from before the scene
of things, it equally creates for us
being
a life within our life being. It
makes us the inhabitants of a world
to which the familiar world is as a
Chaos. Or, shall we rather say that
It reproduces the common Universe
of which we are portions & percipients
-pients, & that it purges from
our inward sight the film of
familiarity which obscures from us
the wonder of our being. It compels
feel
us to percieve that which percieve
that
& to imagine which we know.
It creates anew the universe after
has been annihilated
its annihilation in our minds
by the recurrence of impressions blunted by re-iteration
